segments.text: Excuse me . Do you know where I can find a pay phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is one around the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I make an international call from that pay phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but you have to get a phone card first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where can I get a phone card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get one in the grocery store over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see it . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
